content: The limit is reached for storage space: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

comment.text: The "StorageLimitHeader" translation key is used to display a message indicating that storage space has been reached, showing the current and maximum values. This text appears in the QuotasBar component, specifically on the storage limit threshold. It provides context for users when they reach their allocated storage space.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation retains the English formatting of the placeholders {{currentValue}} and {{maxValue}}. While functional, it would be more natural to consider how these would be handled in Finnish context.  For example, they might be replaced with more descriptive text or Finnish variable names.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider localizing the placeholders further, e.g., 'Käytetty tila / Maksimi tila' or 'Nykyinen käyttö / Suurin sallittu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'හිටුවාගත්' (hituwagahat) is not the most natural or precise way to express 'reached' or 'exceeded' in this context. It implies a setup or construction, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'අධික වූ' (adhika vu), 'ඉක්මවා ඇත' (ikmava tha), or 'සීමාව ඉක්මවා ඇත' (seemawa ikmava tha) instead. 'ඉක්මවා ඇත' (ikmava tha) is a good option, as it directly translates to 'exceeded'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'හිටුවාගත් ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය ඉක්මවා ගොස් ඇත' sounds a bit formal and less natural in conversational Sinhala.  A more common and smoother phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the entire phrase. For example: 'තොගដែඩ ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය ඉක්මවා ඇත: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}' (Thogadaeda ida pramaanya ikmava tha: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}})

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Limit pre úložný priestor je dosiahnutý' translates to 'The limit for storage space is reached'. While technically correct, it sounds less natural than alternatives. A better phrasing would convey the information more clearly and naturally in Slovak.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like: 'Dosiahli ste limit úložného priestoru: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}' (You have reached the storage space limit: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}) or 'Úložný priestor je plný: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}' (Storage space is full: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}).
